amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to report to the Congress on the technological capabilities and equipment to Transportation Security Administration field offices.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3757 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3757 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Inouye. (consideration: CR S10351-10358; text: CR S10351) To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to report to the Congress on the technological capabilities and equipment to Transportation Security Administration field offices.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3757 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3757 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Inouye.
